text.sentence: Felipe--
Will you please register these 4 names: enronemissionsservices.com enronemissionservices.com emissionsservices.com emissionservices.com
(The slight difference between each pair is that one has the "s" on "emissions" and one does not.)
I don't have an IP address for you yet, but I will send it along in the next day or so.
On the "enronemissions.com" issue I'm going to do some double-checking before I get Legal involved.
text.signature: Thanks. ----- Brandon Rigney Corp Webmaster x31583

email.subject: RE: Let's grab these domain names

text.sentence: Brandon,
There will be no costs to our group associated with legal going after that domain name, right?

email.subject: RE: Let's grab these domain names

text.sentence: 1. I have an email out to Mark Holsworth in Legal asking if there will be fees charged back to your group for pursuing "enronemissions.com".
My guess is no, but I'll pass Mark's answer on to you.
2. We did secure the four domain names we discussed (listed below).
Shall I go forward with hooking them up to the site at http://www.enron.com/wholesale/emissions/?
3. Are these new domain names part of a larger plan in your group to promote your site and/or send potential customers to it?
You may want to get with Juli Salvagio in Wholesale Marketing -- she's a great resource for cooking up coordinated marketing approaches.
We work with her on all the Wholesale sites.
4. You mentioned that you found some old content through the search engine.
We are in the process of tracking that down.
If you remember what you typed into the search box that would be helpful.

email.subject: RE: Let's grab these domain names

text.sentence: 1.) If an a fee is involved, we would definitely like to know before pursuing anything.
2.) Yes, please hook that up.
3.) Yes.
I have had numerous conversations with Juli Salvagio.
4.) http://www.ect.enron.com/products/emissions/overview.fset.html
Also, please inform me if our group has incurred any costs or will incur costs by requesting something done.

email.subject: RE: Let's grab these domain names

text.sentence: In the past Legal has vigorously pursued anyone registering a domain name containing "enron" -- I believe it's something they do of their own accord.
So I'm expecting the answer "no chargeback" from Legal.
But I'll let you know.
Do you remember what you typed into the search box?
I tried "emissions" and did not come across old content.
I understand that the page you cite is out there, and we can take it down, but I also want to fix whatever led the search engine to return that page.
